entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northeast 70 gusting to 90 through mainland inlets and valleys this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 7:19 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 7:19 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then clearing. Wind east 20 km/h except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:19 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
